<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>



</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a switch type that can be used inside a [[switch do|switch-do]] block.
<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> When it comes to strings, switch case matching is <b>case-sensitive</b></value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[switch]] condition </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> condition: [[Anything]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Switch Type]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _mySwitch = [[switch]] "Test";
_mySwitch [[do]] { <template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>/* Something */</value></part></template> };</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[switch]] (_condition) [[do]] {
    [[case]] 1: { [[hint]] "1" };
    [[case]] 2: { [[hint]] "2" };
    [[default]] { [[hint]] "default" };
};</code> </value></part><part><name>Example2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value>
<code>[[switch]] (_condition) [[do]] {
    [[case]] "string1";
    [[case]] "string2": { [[hint]] "string1 or string2" };
    [[case]] "string3";
    [[case]] "string4": { [[hint]] "string3 or string4" };
    [[default]] { [[hint]] "default" };
};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Control Structures]] [[switch do]] [[a:b]] [[case]] [[default]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
